result.execSummary:
The defendant Alvaro Brayan Rios Estrada was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Entry into Locked Coin Box, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.125(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant may apply for expungment if law abiding & fine paid in full within 24 mos.. Upon successful completion of probation, record may be expunged, 973.015 and applies within 12 mos. of completion.

If probation/extended supervision revoked or discharges with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alvaro Brayan Rios Estrada in court with attorney Thomas L. Steinman.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court. finds Defendant guilty.  Court withholds sentence.

Counts1 & 2:  AMEND Ct. 1 to 943.125 (entry into locked box) & add Count 2 DC 947.01(1)
24 months Probation
Undergo any counseling per agent.
full time employment
NO contact w/J.H.
Expungement w/in 1 year of eligibility if probation completed successfully
$453.00 x 2  & Supervision Fees (PAID THRU PROBATION)
Paperwork handed in court.
Return date on January 21, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Alvaro Brayan Rios Estrada in court with attorney Thomas L. Steinman.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE had bond modified in court yesterday, need more time to accept new offer.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for January 21, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Alvaro Brayan Rios Estrada in court with attorney Thomas L. Steinman.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court states case and parties state appearances.  Atty Steinman notes this is for a motion to modify bail filed by them to allow DE to have contact w/Bluffview Estates as this is where he has family he needs to reside with.  Requests condition be changed to "no contact w/victim J.H. or his residence or his family".  Court notes what current bond states.  State responds w/some agreement as to modification.  Court questions how close the victim's residence is to the home the DE would be residing in.  Atty Steinman responds that the victim's home is about two blocks from his family's home.  Court orders bond modification as requested.  DE is to have "no contact w/J.H. or his residence or his family".  "No contact with Bluffview Estates" is deleted.
Motion hearing on January 5, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Pre-trial conference on December 19, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Return date on January 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Alvaro Brayan Rios Estrada in court with attorney Deb ORourke o/b/o Thomas L. Steinman.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Reset matter for DE to speak w/atty. Steinman.  State requests PTC and RD.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 19, 2014 at 09:30 am.  Return date scheduled for January 6, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
NO contact w/J.H. or his residence, Bluffview Estates

Pre-trial conference on November 21, 2014 at 08:45 am.
Return date on December 3, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Alvaro Brayan Rios Estrada appeared by video means from LEC w/atty. Tom Steinman. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  DE does qualify for PD representation.  State requests $ Signature bond.   Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $2500.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows: No contact w/J.H. or his residence; No contact w/Bluffview estates; May get belongings w/law enforcement.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 21, 2014 at 08:45 am.  Return date scheduled for December 3, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
